checkout.addressHeaderInformation: If you already have an account, you can register here. If not, you can create an account.
checkout.finishHeaderText: We have received your order and are starting to process it.
checkout.warningPaymentLimits: Please pay attention to the limitations of your PayPal account, credit card or bank account! A newly created PayPal account is usually limited to €2,500.

detail.productIsNotCombinable: Can be selected, but not combined.
detail.productPictureExample: Fig. shows design example: Decoration and accessories not included.

errorMaintenance.pageTitle: Our website is currently under maintenance
errorMaintenance.pageDescription: To present you with the latest products and content, we regularly update our website. Nevertheless, we are still available for you and look forward to your call or email!
errorMaintenance.customerService: You can reach our customer service center Monday to Friday from 8:30 AM to 6:00 PM or Saturday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM at Tel. 0395/42908-0 or
errorMaintenance.specialOffersService: For questions about our discontinued models, samples, or second-choice items, you can reach our specialists Monday to Friday from 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM at Tel. 0395/42908-740 or

flashbags.helpInfo:
Trouble with our shop?

Please don't wait to contact us!
We are happy to hearing from you and getting feedback!

footer.incVat: * All prices incl. VAT plus delivery costs within EU mainland.
